attributes.review: The moment I got the app it asked for my phone number...ya I don’t feel comfortable with a trump app having my number💀💀💀 I also got this app just to get news information that was unbiased and stuff but this is obviously not the app for that🙄🙄
attributes.title: This app sucks✨❤️🤡💖💀✨

attributes.review: i got this app for accurate, unbiased news (unlike cnn 😾) but when i opened it it asked for my phone number🙀 naturally, i gave it bc i would even give out my social security number if daddy trump asked! an hour later, after reading very fact based articles about how democrats are snowflakes, i got a call😸it was from daddy trump’s campaign🙈!!! they said if i didn’t give them my address, they would force me to vote for Joe The Pedophile😡 so i gave them my addy🕺🏻🕺🏻. uh oh! next thing i know, the secret service is at my door 🚪they kidnapped me and took me to an underground basement😒 they started to give me a spray tan, bleach and cut my hair, and take away my ability to drink water with one hand!! i realized at the end of this makeover that i looked just like daddy trump😛 right as i was about to leave, someone stopped me and cut off my pp!! i realized that i was now truly a clone of daddy trump. when i got home, i verbally abused my son darron and my wife delania🐟so far i really liked this app😆but then i realized that my now tiny pp had rendered me useless in bed 🛌. this is officially the worst app!!!
attributes.title: worst app ever!!

attributes.review: since i am trumps #1 supporter i just had to download this app . and then it started to ask me for my phone number and if i wanted notifications, and i was not comfortable with my personal information in the app . a little later a hot cheeto puff comes banging on my door . yelling at me because i didn’t put my number in . next thing you know there are 700 karen’s at my door (plus the orange man) yelling racist stuff 😡. and i couldn’t stand that so i yelled back “YOU STUPID F**KING DINOSAUR” and punched the creepy orange man 75 times in the face. then my mom comes and wakes me up from my horrible nightmare and i still have ptsd to this day . 100/10 would NOT recommend it gave me horrible nightmares and ptsd 🤕😪.
attributes.title: no ✨

attributes.review:
They’re lots of extremely rude and ignorant people on the app.I was called the n word about 5 times and I hadn’t even had the app for 24 hours yet.Also,I was on there to debate why he’s a horrible president and person but most of them just say “TRUMP 2020!”

After a long day of work😤, Kanye West 🧔🏿goes to his Kanye Nest 🏠to take his Kanye Rest😴🛌. He wakes up feeling his Kanye Best🤩. Then he’ll get Kanye Dressed🕺🏾 in his Kanye Vest🦺 to go on a Kanye Quest🏙. He goes to church 💒and becomes Kanye Blessed🙆🏿‍♂️, then to a hotel room 🏤to be a Kanye Guest. Then to the school 🏢to take his Kanye Test✏️📃. He forgot to brush his teeth 🦷. Did he run🏃 out of Kanye Crest? His neighbor stole it, what a Kanye Pest😡.

My name is Bella Thorne💁💕 and this👌 is the story 🙇‍♀️📝📕of the time I found out I had dyslexia👀🤓🚫. I remember🤔🙄🕑 when I started first grade👆😜💯, right away it was awful 👎🙅because I couldn’t read 📖📝as well as the other kids🚫🙎‍♂️🙎. My brain 🙆mixed 😳👀up letters like b and d and m and w 😭😩🔤. Dyslexia 👀🚫is different 👌for everyone who has it. For me 🙋it makes it harder😩🍆 to read📖 or write📝. I started 🏁💯working😅😤 really hard 👌on how to read better 📕👌💯. My family 👨‍👩‍👧☺️helped 😌👏me by making me read 📚everything, from menus📄, to cereal boxes📦, to road signs🚗⚠️. Today I read 📖grade above 👆😭my grade level😏😎💦. And I learned 👓😁to face problems 🚫😳not to run🏃‍♀️ away from them👋👏. Dyslexia 😳👀🔡 makes things hard 😩💦 for me 👸but not🚫🙅 impossible ❌😏.
attributes.title: What the hell even is this?

attributes.review: I downloaded this app for the sore purpose of supporting our ✨✨✨K I N G ✨✨✨ but it was a HORRIFIC ATROCITY. Although the amount of beautiful pop-ups of this presidents face made me vomit 🤢 of pure joy, I just could NOT keep this app on my phone. My photos were filtered so I looked orange in every single one. I don’t know where the permissions lie but it somehow got ahold of all my social media platforms and posted “TRUMPTRUMPTRUMPTRUMPTRUMP✨o k b o o m e r ✨TRUMP” on each one!! After that my phone just completely crashed as did my IPad Smart watch and MacBook. They completely shut down and an orange screen blinked “vote for anyone but trump pls” in morse code and gave me an epileptic seizure. Absolutely ridiculous! THIS APP IS A HAZARD!!!!!!
attributes.title: GARBAGE

attributes.review: @astrosfapri this app smelled like absolute ✨cheetos✨ it was ✨DISGUSTING✨ if you see this☺️✨🌸🧚💕 leave a one star💕☺️🧚🌸✨ anyways...
attributes.title: This app kill my dog

attributes.review:
Ok ok so all these ppl out here writing all these fake reviews😡😡😤😂, so i had to try out the app for myself🆗🤩🧒🥰😎.

Needless to say, before even downloading this app, i was told that if i was under the age of 17😤😠😡😟😖😭🤯🤬🤬😷😈💩, and i was furious 👁👄👁. 

I had of course ignored 🤷‍♀️the warning after downloading it to my lovely Eishley’s 🥰😘😍💕💝💞🧚‍♀️🌸 iPad, but immediately after opening the app she almost died🌝👻💀☠️🤯😳🤭 and was to the hospital🏥😡😭😷🤢🤮. When we got there, the doctor said that she was diagnosed with Trumpet🦆🐷🎺  Syndrome, an incurable disease that causes the person to say MAGA🇺🇸 during funerals😭☠️ and weddings💝💕🌸🧚‍♀️, and also to wear the same suit and tie to every public event🤢🤮😷. Of course i had to put my child down 😀and replace her with my pet rock Steve🌟✨🥰😍, who is so much easier to take care of🥰🌝😄😀😙👁👄👁 

Thanks to this app my life has become much simpler😂🥰😛, but i can’t get rid of the app because it burns 🤯🔥me with holy light ⭐️💥✝️when i press delete😡😭. I had to go to AppleCare 😤😤and hospitalize my phone😱😨🥵, but unfortunately he did not make it rip 🦋✨Manny Junior✨🦋 2019 - 2020. Other than that, the little voices in my head 🙉🙈🙊🙃other than telling me to kill my family🔪👀😱 and all snowflake supporters🤬🥵😡 is now telling me to support the 🦋✨hòłÿ œræñgë çhéëtœ✨🦋 we worship and will sacrifice newborn babies👶👅 to. 

Whoops accidentally pressed 1 star⭐️ for the review🌝😂 but everything is fate and i guess itll stay that way✝️😂🙃. 

Praise be with you all, ✨🦋Karen the libtard hater.🥵✝️
attributes.title: 😍🌝👁👄👁Not all the libtards trying to delete this app 👁👅👁🥰😛✌︎🌝

attributes.review: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way that a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway. Because bees don’t care what humans think is impossible.” SEQ. 75 - “INTRO TO BARRY” INT. BENSON HOUSE - DAY ANGLE ON: Sneakers on the ground. Camera PANS UP to reveal BARRY BENSON’S BEDROOM ANGLE ON: Barry’s hand flipping through different sweaters in his closet. BARRY Yellow black, yellow black, yellow black, yellow black, yellow black, yellow black...oohh, black and yellow... ANGLE ON: Barry wearing the sweater he picked, looking in the mirror. BARRY (CONT’D) Yeah, let’s shake it up a little. He picks the black and yellow one. He then goes to the sink, takes the top off a CONTAINER OF HONEY, and puts some honey into his hair. He squirts some in his mouth and gargles. Then he takes the lid off the bottle, and rolls some on like deodorant. CUT TO: INT. BENSON HOUSE KITCHEN - CONTINUOUS Barry’s mother, JANET BENSON, yells up at Barry. JANET BENSON Barry, breakfast is ready! CUT TO: "Bee Movie" - JS REVISIONS 8/13/07 1. INT. BARRY’S ROOM - CONTINUOUS BARRY Coming! SFX: Phone RINGING. Barry’s antennae vibrate as they RING like a phone. Barry’s hands are wet. He looks around for a towel. BARRY (CONT’D) Hang on a second! He wipes his hands on his sweater, and pulls his antennae down to his ear and mouth. BARRY (CONT'D) Hello? His best friend, ADAM FLAYMAN, is on the other end. ADAM Barry? BARRY Adam? ADAM Can you believe this is happening? BARRY Can’t believe it. I’ll pick you up. Barry sticks his stinger in a sharpener. SFX: BUZZING AS HIS STINGER IS SHARPENED. He tests the sharpness with his finger. SFX: Bing. BARRY (CONT’D) Looking sharp. ANGLE ON: Barry hovering down the hall, sliding down the staircase bannister. Barry’s mother, JANET BENSON, is in the kitchen. JANET BENSON Barry, why don’t you use the stairs? Your father paid good money for those. "Bee Movie" - JS REVISIONS 8/13/07 2. BARRY Sorry, I’m excited. Barry’s father, MARTIN BENSON, ENTERS. He’s reading a NEWSPAPER with the HEADLINE, “Queen gives birth to thousandtuplets: Resting Comfortably.” MARTIN BENSON Here’s the graduate. We’re very proud of you, Son. And a perfect report card, all B’s. JANET BENSON (mushing Barry’s hair) Very proud. BARRY Ma! I’ve got a thing going here. Barry re-adjusts his hair, starts to leave. JANET BENSON You’ve got some lint on your fuzz. She picks it off. BARRY Ow, that’s me! MARTIN BENSON Wave to us. We’ll be in row 118,000. Barry zips off. BARRY Bye! JANET BENSON Barry, I told you, stop flying in the house! CUT TO: SEQ. 750 - DRIVING TO GRADUATION EXT. BEE SUBURB - MORNING A GARAGE DOOR OPENS. Barry drives out in his CAR. "Bee Movie" - JS REVISIONS 8/13/07 3. ANGLE ON: Barry’s friend, ADAM FLAYMAN, standing by the curb. He’s reading a NEWSPAPER with the HEADLINE: “Frisbee Hits Hive: Internet Down. Bee-stander: “I heard a sound, and next thing I knew...wham-o!.” Barry drives up, stops in front of Adam. Adam jumps in. BARRY Hey, Adam. ADAM Hey, Barry. (pointing at Barry’s hair) Is that fuzz gel? BARRY A little. It’s a special day. Finally graduating. ADAM I never thought I’d make it. BARRY Yeah, three days of grade school, three days of high school. ADAM Those were so awkward.
attributes.title: No.

attributes.review: Sooooo I got this app to give our lil cheeto boi a chance but as soon as I opened it, my phone went black. I rebooted my phone, and tried again to find some of my apps from my phone missing. Weird right? I called the Apple store to see if they could help and unlike the president’s stupid ass, they were very customer friendly and willing to help🥰.  I got my phone back to normal and tried going into the app again but it was blank. So then I tried leaving the app and going back to it and by then I was FED UP😤. I tried one last time, and to my surprise it worked! Until I saw a clown on my screen🤡. -27591/10 do not recommend🥰✨💅🏼.
attributes.title: ✨there's no option for zero🥺🦧✨

attributes.review: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way that a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway. Because bees don’t care what humans think is impossible.” SEQ. 75 - “INTRO TO BARRY” INT. BENSON HOUSE - DAY ANGLE ON: Sneakers on the ground. Camera PANS UP to reveal BARRY BENSON’S BEDROOM ANGLE ON: Barry’s hand flipping through different sweaters in his closet. BARRY Yellow black, yellow black, yellow black, yellow black, yellow black, yellow black...oohh, black and yellow... ANGLE ON: Barry wearing the sweater he picked, looking in the mirror. BARRY (CONT’D) Yeah, let’s shake it up a little. He picks the black and yellow one. He then goes to the sink, takes the top off a CONTAINER OF HONEY, and puts some honey into his hair. He squirts some in his mouth and gargles. Then he takes the lid off the bottle, and rolls some on like deodorant. CUT TO: INT. BENSON HOUSE KITCHEN - CONTINUOUS Barry’s mother, JANET BENSON, yells up at Barry. JANET BENSON Barry, breakfast is ready! CUT TO: "Bee Movie" - JS REVISIONS 8/13/07 1. INT. BARRY’S ROOM - CONTINUOUS BARRY Coming! SFX: Phone RINGING. Barry’s antennae vibrate as they RING like a phone. Barry’s hands are wet. He looks around for a towel. BARRY (CONT’D) Hang on a second! He wipes his hands on his sweater, and pulls his antennae down to his ear and mouth. BARRY (CONT'D) Hello? His best friend, ADAM FLAYMAN, is on the other end. ADAM Barry? BARRY Adam? ADAM Can you believe this is happening? BARRY Can’t believe it. I’ll pick you up. Barry sticks his stinger in a sharpener. SFX: BUZZING AS HIS STINGER IS SHARPENED. He tests the sharpness with his finger. SFX: Bing. BARRY (CONT’D) Looking sharp. ANGLE ON: Barry hovering down the hall, sliding down the staircase bannister. Barry’s mother, JANET BENSON, is in the kitchen. JANET BENSON Barry, why don’t you use the stairs? Your father paid good money for those. "Bee Movie" - JS REVISIONS 8/13/07 2. BARRY Sorry, I’m excited. Barry’s father, MARTIN BENSON, ENTERS. He’s reading a NEWSPAPER with the HEADLINE, “Queen gives birth to thousandtuplets: Resting Comfortably.” MARTIN BENSON Here’s the graduate. We’re very proud of you, Son. And a perfect report card, all B’s. JANET BENSON (mushing Barry’s hair) Very proud. BARRY Ma! I’ve got a thing going here. Barry re-adjusts his hair, starts to leave. JANET BENSON You’ve got some lint on your fuzz. She picks it off. BARRY Ow, that’s me! MARTIN BENSON Wave to us. We’ll be in row 118,000. Barry zips off. BARRY Bye! JANET BENSON Barry, I told you, stop flying in the house! CUT TO: SEQ. 750 - DRIVING TO GRADUATION EXT. BEE SUBURB - MORNING A GARAGE DOOR OPENS. Barry drives out in his CAR. "Bee Movie" - JS REVISIONS 8/13/07 3. ANGLE ON: Barry’s friend, ADAM FLAYMAN, standing by the curb. He’s reading a NEWSPAPER with the HEADLINE: “Frisbee Hits Hive: Internet Down. Bee-stander: “I heard a sound, and next thing I knew...wham-o!.” Barry drives up, stops in front of Adam. Adam jumps in. BARRY Hey, Adam. ADAM Hey, Barry. (pointing at Barry’s hair) Is that fuzz gel? BARRY A little. It’s a special day. Finally graduating. ADAM I never thought I’d make it. BARRY Yeah, three days of grade school, three days of high school. ADAM Those were so awkward. BARRY Three days of college. I’m glad I took off one day in the middle and just hitchhiked around the hive. ADAM You did come back different. They drive by a bee who’s jogging. ARTIE Hi Barry! BARRY (to a bee pedestrian) Hey Artie, growing a mustache? Looks good. Barry and Adam drive from the suburbs into the city. ADAM Hey, did you hear about Frankie? "Bee Movie" - JS REVISIONS 8/13/07 4. BARRY Yeah. ADAM You going to his funeral? BARRY No, I’m not going to his funeral. Everybody knows you sting someone you die, you don’t waste it on a squirrel. He was such a hot head. ADAM Yeah, I guess he could’ve just gotten out of the way. The DRIVE through a loop de loop. BARRY AND ADAM Whoa...Whooo...wheee!! ADAM I love this incorporating the amusement park right into our regular day. BARRY I guess that’s why they say we don’t need vacations. CUT TO: SEQ. 95 - GRADUATION EXT. GRADUATION CEREMONY - CONTINUOUS Barry and Adam come to a stop. They exit the car, and fly over the crowd to their seats. * BARRY * (re: graduation ceremony) * Boy, quite a bit of pomp...under * the circumstances. * They land in their seats. BARRY (CONT’D) Well Adam, today we are men. "Bee Movie" - JS REVISIONS 8/13/07 5. ADAM We are. BARRY Bee-men. A
attributes.title: I hate it
